data.title: General information
data.text:
Professional qualifications

BaccalaurÃ©at - Academie de Paris.

Experience

â¢ He held many executive positions at various financial corporations:

â¢ From 2007 to 2023 he has been Chief Representative - Group Country Chairman of Jardine Matheson Ltd. (Vietnam).

â¢ From 2000 to 2003, he was Head of European Business Development - Asia Pacific at HSBC Asia Pacific Head Office and then became President and CEO of HSBC Vietnam from 2003 to 2007.

â¢ From 1969 to 2000, he had held various executive positions at Credit Commercial de France and Banque Worms in France and Hong Kong.

â¢ In addition, he also held some important positions including Advisor for Foreign Trade to the French Government and Chairman of EuroCham, Vietnam Business Forum and Director of Asia Commercial Bank.

â¢ He was awarded Officer of The French National Merit Order and Knight of The Legion of Honor by the President of France and the Friendship Medal by the President of The Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

Professional qualifications

Civil Engineer, Hanoi University of Architecture 1976-1981.

Experience

â¢ From 2011 to 2021, he was a member of the National Assembly (XI session, XII session), Member of the National Assembly of the XII, XIII, XIV, and held many other important positions in the National Assembly such as Member of the National Assembly Party Union, Member of the National Assembly Standing Committee, General Secretary of the National Assembly, Chairman of the National Assembly Office (XIII session, XIV), Secretary of the Party Committee of the National Assembly Office, Chief of the Party Office of the National Assembly, Chief of the National Election Council, Chairman of the Vietnam-Australia Friendship Parliamentary Group.

â¢ From 2005 to 2011, he was Secretary of the Provincial Party Committee of Thai Binh Province and held many other important positions such as Deputy Permanent Secretary of Thai Binh Province, Chairman of the Provincial People's Council, Secretary of the Provincial People's Committee, Chairman of the Provincial People's Committee, Head of the XII National People's Delegation of Thai Binh Province.

â¢ From 2003 to 2005, he held the positions of Standing Committee of the Provincial Committee, Secretary of the Party Committee, Chairman of the People's Council of Thai Binh City.

â¢ Before 2003, he worked as Director of Thai Binh Department of Industry, Deputy Director of Department of Construction, Deputy Director of Construction Management Department, Director of Thai Binh Ceramic Tile Company.

Awards

â¢ Second Independence Medal.

â¢ First Labor Medal.

â¢ Third Labor Medal.

â¢ Great National Unity Medal.

â¢ Second Freedom Medal of the Lao PDR.

â¢ Prime Minister's Certificate of Merit.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Master in Business Administration (MBA), Imperial College, London (1997).

â¢ Bachelor of Engineering (Mechanical), National University of Singapore (1988).

â¢ Advanced Management Programme (AMP), Harvard Business School (2005).

â¢ International Directors Programme (IDP), INSEAD (2017).

â¢ Senior Accredited Director, Singapore Institute of Directors (SID) (2024).

Experience

â¢ He has many years of experience in corporate and economics management at both private and public institutions.

â¢ In 23 years (1999 - 2022), he held top management roles at consumer goods and tourism companies such as Fraser & Neave Ltd, Heineken-APB (China), Management Services Co. Ltd, Asia Pacific Breweries Ltd, Wildlife Reserves Singapore Group.

â¢ From 1994 to 1996, he was Deputy Director, Regional Tourism, Singapore Tourism Board.

â¢ Previously, he was Assistant Head, International Business Development, Singapore Economic Development Board from 1993 to 1994.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Master in Finance and International Business, Leeds Metropolitan University, UK (2012).

â¢ Bachelor in Economics, University of Finance - Accounting, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam (1994).

â¢ Certificate in Advanced Director Certification Program (DCP) conferred by Vietnam Institute of Directors (VIOD).

â¢ Certificate of Global Leadership Program (GLP), PACE Institute of Management.

Experience

â¢ He has over 27 years of experience in the field of finance and accounting and has held the position of Chief Financial Officer cum Chief Accountant since 2015.

â¢ From 2003 to 2015, he held managerial positions at Vinamilk's Finance - Accounting Division including Deputy Head of Accounting and Chief Accountant.

â¢ From 1994 to 2003, he held different positions at Finance - Accounting Division of Vinamilk.

Position at other entities

â¢ BOD member, Vietnam Livestock Corporation JSC (Vilico).

â¢ BOD member, Del Monte - Vinamilk Dairy, Philippines, Inc.

â¢ Vice Chairman, Vietnam CFO Club.

Professional qualifications

â¢ MBS (with Distinction in Accounting and Finance) and BBS (with First Class Honors in Accounting and Finance), Massey University, New Zealand.

â¢ Fellow of Singapore Institute of Directors (SID) since 2013.

â¢ Associate Member of Institute of Singapore Chartered Accountants (ISCA) since 2003.

â¢ Member of Institute of Chartered Secretaries & Administrators (ACIS) since 1990.

â¢ Associate Member of Chartered Secretaries Institute of Singapore (CSIS).

Experience

â¢ He has over 15 years of experience as a company director. He is currently a member of the Board of Directors, Audit Committee and Sustainability and Risk Management Committee of Saigon Beer- Alcohol-Beverage Corporation. He is also an Alternate Director at Fraser and Neave Limited and a director of many companies in ThaiBev Group.

â¢ For over 22 years, he held senior positions at several financial and investment companies and has extensive international experience in many Asian countries.

â¢ Prior to these roles, he was a university lecturer in New Zealand.

Position at other entities

â¢ CEO, BeerCo Limited.

â¢ Member of the Board Executive Committee and Risk Management Committee of Fraser and Neave Ltd and Fraser & Neave Holdings Berhad.

â¢ Non-Executive BOD member at: Heritas Capital Management Pte Ltd, IMC Pan Asia Alliance Corporation, Prudence Holdings Ltd.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Master of Public Finance and Degree of Public Management, National School of Administration, France.

â¢ Certificate in Treasury Inspection, National Treasury School, France.

â¢ Bachelor of Finance - Accounting, University of Finance and Accountancy (Vietnam Academy of Finance now), Hanoi.

â¢ Certificates in Public Financial Management, Accounting, Auditing.

â¢ Certificates in Advanced Auditing conferred by international organizations.

â¢ Certificate in Advanced Director Certification Program (DCP) conferred by Vietnam Institute of Directors (VIOD).

Experience

He is currently an independent member of the BOD and Audit Committee of the following companies listed on HOSE:

â¢ Vietnam Dairy Products JSC (VNM).

â¢ Hau Giang Pharmaceutical JSC (DHG).

â¢ An Gia Real Estate Investment and Development JSC - An Gia Group (AGG).

â¢ South Logistics JSC - Sotrans Group (STG).

â¢ REE Corp (REE).

â¢ He has been a BOD member of VIOD since April 2018.

â¢ He had more than 8 years of working experience as Director of Auditing and Internal Control of Big C Vietnam.

â¢ He had nearly 6 years of working experience as Deputy Head of Accounting - State Treasury of Vietnam - Ministry of Finance.

â¢ Previously, he had more than 11 years of working at Accounting - State Treasury of Vietnam at Specialist and Executive level.

â¢ He received merit certificates from Prime Minister and many from the Ministry of Finance from 1997 to 2006.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Master of Business Administrations (MBA), Institute of Business Administration

â¢ Bachelor of Business Administrations, National Economics University.

â¢ Bachelor of English Linguistics, Vietnam National University, Hanoi.

â¢ Certificate of Corporate Finance Consulting, Securities Research and Training Center.

Experience

â¢ She has served as a BOD member in companies since 2013. She is currently a Chairwoman at Hau Giang Pharmaceutical JSC.

â¢ She has been working in the Investment Department of SCIC for 15 years at different positions. She is currently Head of Investment Department No.3.

â¢ Previously, she had 8 years of working experience in the field of Financial Consulting and Compliance Accounting at Trang An Securities JSC (2007 - 2008) and Mizuho Bank Hanoi (2000 - 2007).

â¢ She was awarded a Merit Certificate from the Minister of Finance in 2015 and a Merit Award in Finance industry for her achievements in 2016.

Position at other entities

â¢ Chairwoman, Hau Giang Pharmaceutical JSC.

â¢ Head of Investment Department No.3, SCIC.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Certificate of Economics Management, Leningrad Institute of Engineering and Economics, Russia.

â¢ Certificate of Government Management, National Academy of Politics, Vietnam.

â¢ Engineer of Milk Dairy Processing technology.

â¢ Moscow University of Meat and Dairy Processing (currently known as Moscow State University of Applied Biotechnology).

â¢ Certificate of Corporate Governance.

Experience

â¢ She has more than 30 years of experience in the role of CEO (from 1992 to present) leading Vinamilk through many tenures. She has been honorably awarded many local and international prizes, such as First-class Labour Medal (2006); Asia's Top 50 Most Powerful Businesswomen awarded by Forbes for 4 consecutive times (2012 - 2015); The Excellent Businesswomen (2014) by Corporate Governance Asia; Nikkei and New Zealand prizes for all her brilliant contributions; and Lifetime Achievement award honored by Forbes for the first time (2018).

â¢ Previously, she had more than 8 years (1984 - 1992) in the role of Deputy CEO - Economics at Vinamilk.

â¢ From 1976 to 1983, she had experienced many positions in many different departments and then became Deputy Technical Director at Thong Nhat dairy factory in 1982.

Position at other entities

â¢ Chairwoman, Vietnam Dairy Cow One Member Co., Ltd.

â¢ Chairwoman, Thong Nhat -Thanh Hoa Dairy Cow One Member Co., Ltd.

â¢ BOD member, Driftwood Dairy Holding Corporation.

â¢ Chairwoman, Lao-Jagro Development XiengKhouang Co., Ltd.

â¢ BOD member, Miraka Holdings Limited.

â¢ Chairwoman, Vietnam Livestock Corporation JSC.

â¢ Chairwoman, Moc Chau Dairy Cattle Breeding JSC.

â¢ Chairwoman, Del Monte - Vinamilk Dairy Philippines, Inc.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Doctor of Business Administration at Asian Institute of Technology.

â¢ Master of Business Administration at the University of Queensland, Australia.

â¢ Chemical & Food Engineer at Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology, Vietnam.

Experience

â¢ He has been appointed as Marketing Executive Director since July 2021.

â¢ From 2019 to June 2021, he worked as Marketing Director of Masan MEATLife Corporation.

â¢ From 2014 to 2016, he worked as Marketing Director at Masan Nutri-Science JSC.

â¢ From 2009 to 2014, he worked as the Marketing Director at Vinamilk.

â¢ Before 2009, he held the positions of Marketing Manager at Masan Food Corporation, Head of Marketing Department at Dutch Lady Vietnam and Assistant Brand Manager at P&G.

Position at other entities

â¢ BOD member, Moc Chau Dairy Cattle Breeding JSC.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Mechatronics Engineering - Control and Automation, Ha Noi University of Science and Technology.

Experience

â¢ He has been appointed as Executive Director of Production since February 2022.

â¢ During 13 years (2009-2022), he has experienced in management positions at Vinamilk such as: Technical Director of Factory, Asset Management Director, Technical and Construction Director of Production Department, Technical Director of Project Department, Production Planning Director and Director of Factory.

â¢ From 1992 to 2009, he had held many different positions in the Production Department and Project Department such as: Technical Engineer, Production Assistant Manager, Project Manager of Tien Son Dairy Factory expansion project.

Position at other entities

â¢ BOD member, Moc Chau Dairy Cattle Breeding JSC.

Professional qualifications

â¢ Engineer in Automation, Moscow State University of Applied Biotechnology (1998).

â¢ He belonged to the first batch of international students sent by Vinamilk to study under the training program and prepare the leadership team.

Experience

â¢ He has been appointed to the position of Executive Director - Dairy Farm Development since September 2023.

â¢ From 2016 to 2023, he is the CEO of Angkormilk, a subsidiary 100% owned by Vinamilk in Cambodia, and has helped Angkormilk achieve impressive growth for many consecutive years.

â¢ Previously, from 1999 to 2016, he held various positions at factories and projects including: Project leader of Angkor Dairy Factory in Cambodia; Head of Technical Department, Head of Electrical Team - M&E Department and coordinate the project of installing powdered milk filling line at Dielac Dairy Factory; in charge of engineering, procurement, installation, putting into operation equipment of Saigon Coffee Factory project.

Positions at other entities

â¢ CEO, Vietnam Livestock Corporation - JSC.

â¢ BOD member, Angkor Dairy Products Co., Ltd.
